sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d88dd03b1baa04108ed631d7dc4bcbbd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.EasyScheduledJobHelper</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EasyScheduledJobHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var EasyScheduledJobHelper = Class.create();
EasyScheduledJobHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function(scheduledJob) {

        this.job = scheduledJob;

        this.number = scheduledJob.getValue('u_number');
        this.action = scheduledJob.getValue('u_action');
        this.actionDisplay = scheduledJob.u_action.getDisplayValue();
        this.table = scheduledJob.getValue('u_table');
        this.filter = scheduledJob.getValue('u_record_filter');
        this.fieldValues = scheduledJob.getValue('u_set_fields');

        this.isUpdate = (this.action == 'update') ? true : false;
        this.setWorkflow = (scheduledJob.getValue('u_setworkflow') != '0') ? true : false;
        this.autoSysFields = (scheduledJob.getValue('u_autosysfields') != '0') ? true : false;
        this.cancelRecordWorkflow = (scheduledJob.getValue('u_cancel_related_workflow') != '0') ? true : false;

        this.isLogging = (scheduledJob.getValue('u_add_log') != '0') ? true : false;
        this.logField = scheduledJob.getValue('u_log_field');

    },
    process: function() {

        this.startJobInfo();

        switch (this.action) {
            case 'update':
                this.updateRecords();
                break;
            case 'delete':
                this.deleteRecords();
                break;
            case 'copy':
                this.copyRecords();
                break;
            default:
                this.invalidJobInfo();
        }


    },
    updateRecords: function() {
        var workflow = new Workflow();
        var recordLog = this.number + ': Updating ';
        var records = new GlideRecord(this.table);
        records.addEncodedQuery(this.filter);
        records.query();
        while (records.next()) {
            records.applyEncodedQuery(this.fieldValues);
            if (this.cancelRecordWorkflow) {
                workflow.cancel(records);
            }
            if (!this.autoSysFields) {
                records.autoSysFields(false);
            }
            if (!this.setWorkflow) {
                records.setWorkflow(false);
            }
            if (this.isLogging) {
                this.addLog(recordLog + records.getValue(this.logField));
            }
            records.update();
        }

    },
    deleteRecords: function() {

        var recordLog = this.number + ': Deleting ';
        var records = new GlideRecord(this.table);
        records.addEncodedQuery(this.filter);
        records.query();
        while (records.next()) {
            if (this.isLogging) {
                this.addLog(recordLog + records.getValue(this.logField));
            }
            records.deleteRecord();
        }

    },
    copyRecords: function() {

        var recordLog = this.number + ': Copying ';
        var records = new GlideRecord(this.table);
        records.addEncodedQuery(this.filter);
        records.query();
        while (records.next()) {
            records.applyEncodedQuery(this.fieldValues);
            if (!this.setWorkflow) {
                records.setWorkflow(false);
            }
            if (this.isLogging) {
                this.addLog(recordLog + records.getValue(this.logField));
            }
            records.insert();
        }

    },
    startJobInfo: function() {

        var jobInfo = 'Job ' + this.number + ' started. ';
        jobInfo += this.actionDisplay + ' action will be performed on ' + this.table;
        this.addLog(jobInfo);

    },
    invalidJobInfo: function() {

        var jobInfo = 'Job ' + this.number + ' has invalid action.';
        this.addLog(jobInfo);

    },
    addLog: function(message) {
        gs.log(message, 'Easy Scheduled Job');
    },
    type: 'EasyScheduledJobHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-31 11:22:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d88dd03b1baa04108ed631d7dc4bcbbd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EasyScheduledJobHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Easy Scheduled Job" source="05e010b31b6a04108ed631d7dc4bcb37">05e010b31b6a04108ed631d7dc4bcb37</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Easy Scheduled Job">05e010b31b6a04108ed631d7dc4bcb37</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d88dd03b1baa04108ed631d7dc4bcbbd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-07 13:21:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
